# Bibliography {.unnumbered}

## Books

[from Data to Viz](https://www.data-to-viz.com)

[Fundamentals of Data Visualization, by Claus O. Wilke](https://clauswilke.com/dataviz/)

[PyNotes in Agriscience](https://soilwater.github.io/pynotes-agriscience/intro.html)

[Forecasting: Principles and Practice (3rd ed), by Rob J Hyndman and George Athanasopoulos](https://otexts.com/fpp3/)

[Python for Finance Cookbook 2nd Edition - Code Repository](https://github.com/erykml/Python-for-Finance-Cookbook-2E)

[Practical time series analysis,: prediction with statistics and machine learning, by Aileen Nielsen](https://huji.primo.exlibrisgroup.com/permalink/972HUJI_INST/10ptda2/alma9920842016603701)  
The online edition of this book is available for Hebrew University staff and students.

[Time series analysis with Python cookbook : practical recipes for exploratory data analysis, data preparation, forecasting, and model evaluation, by Tarek A. Atwan](Tarek A. Atwan)  
The online edition of this book is available for Hebrew University staff and students.

[Hands-on Time Series Analysis with Python: From Basics to Bleeding Edge Techniques, by B V Vishwas, Ashish Patel](https://huji.primo.exlibrisgroup.com/permalink/972HUJI_INST/10ptda2/alma9920845706703701)  
The online edition of this book is available for Hebrew University staff and students.
